sources.title: The Uncultured Vulture (1947)
sources.description: A Columbia Color Phantasy (production number 8702) that finds a professor washed up on a barren island with the only inhabitant a vulture, with an uncanny resemblance to Jimmy Durante, whose goal is to hasten the demise, and make a meal of the professor. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-uncultured-vulture-1947/

metadata.Plot: A Columbia Color Phantasy (production number 8702) that finds a professor washed up on a barren island with the only inhabitant a vulture, with an uncanny resemblance to Jimmy Durante, whose goal is to hasten the demise, and make a meal of the professor.
metadata.Actors: Stan Freberg, Cal Howard, Harry Lang
